publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2347.1 Dennis Canavan: Scotland and the Current International Situation-As an amendment to motion (S1M-2347) in the name of Mr John Swinney, leave out from "and agrees" to end and insert "but agrees that any measure to that effect must be based on the role of international law and respect for human rights, particularly innocent people's right to life, and therefore calls for an end to the current military action in Afghanistan and for an effective humanitarian operation to meet the desperate needs of the innocent Afghan population." Supported by: Robin Harper*, Tommy Sheridan*, Mr John McAllion*
